title: Quick Practice
description: Answer 5 questions in 5 minutes to sharpen your SAT English skills.

questions.question: Choose the correct sentence.
options: A) Each of the students have a book.
B) Each of the students has a book.
C) Each of the student have a book.
D) Each students has a book.
questions.explanation: 'Each' is singular, so the correct verb is 'has'.

questions.question: What does 'meticulous' most nearly mean?
options: A) Careless
B) Quick
C) Very detailed
D) Loud
questions.explanation: Meticulous means showing great attention to detail.

questions.question: She grabbed an umbrella before leaving. What can you infer?
options: A) It was sunny
B) It was raining
C) It was windy
D) It was snowing

questions.question: Which sentence is most concise?
options: A) Due to the fact that it was late, he left.
B) Because it was late, he left.
C) It was late in time, so he left.
D) He left at a late time.
questions.explanation: 'Because' replaces the wordy phrase 'due to the fact that'.

questions.question: Choose the correct verb.
options: A) The group of players are ready.
B) The group of players is ready.
C) The group are ready.
D) The players group is ready.
